title: newly upgraded 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom+2-car attached garage
posting_body: This newly upgraded 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom split-level house in Stow has a lot to offer!
Inside, it features fresh paint plus newer light fixtures and flooring.
The kitchen shows off stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops and natural wood cabinets.
Apart from the comfortable and stylish bedrooms and bathroom, this house also has a family room that is ideal for your gatherings and home activities!
Outside, you can enjoy the sun on the patio or in the fenced-in backyard, or relax in the shade of the covered patio.
Last, but not least, there is a 2-car attached garage and central air-conditioning.
